job_description: Enterprise Resiliency Senior Advisor Of course, we want things to go exactly as planned, but that isn't always what actually happens. How we react to Cybersecurity threats is critical to keeping our business stable, and why our Business Continuity team is so important. We make sure that procedures are in place to keep a company operational during a crisis and make preparations to mitigate the damage in case such an event were to occur. Join us as a Enterprise Resiliency Senior Advisor on our Enterprise Resiliency team to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact. What you’ll achieve As an Enterprise Resiliency Senior Advisor, you will play a critical role in the ongoing transformation of Dell’s Global Business Continuity, Crisis Management, and Disaster Recovery programs ensuring the company continues to effectively manage critical business disruptions in an increasingly complex world. As part of our Enterprise Resiliency team, you will support the development of risk-based planning and testing programs. This will include driving initiatives within Business Units to enhance our world leading resiliency capabilities by prioritizing, tracking, and reporting on Resiliency compliance. You will: Establish, cultivate, and maintain relationships with Enterprise Resiliency team members and stakeholders to understand program needs and challenges Provide guidance on sound structure, planning, testing, and governance to keep Resiliency Programs aligned, current, relevant, actionable, and auditable Collaborate with resiliency professionals worldwide before, during, and after tests and exercises to ensure evidenced capability of plans and compliance to standards Provide updates, education, and presentations to staff and management on industry trends and best practices for Enterprise Resiliency Drive the maturity of Resiliency programs by identifying opportunities for automation and process simplification Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements 5 years proven experience on Enterprise-level Resiliency Program (Crisis Management, Business Continuity, and Disaster Recovery) Experience building, facilitating, and measuring effective Crisis Management, Business Continuity, and Disaster Recovery plans and testing programs based on industry and regulatory standards Proven experience partnering with leaders across lines of business to secure organizational commitment and resources on strategic initiatives Professional certifications (DRII, BCI, ISC2, or ISACA) required Desirable Requirements Cyber Resiliency (Backup, Archive, Ransomware) governance, testing, and best practices. Third-Party Risk & Resiliency Planning Experience with resilient system architecture, high availability, cloud, managed services, and emerging technology solutions. Process automation and Artificial Intelligence a plus Who We Are We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you. Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Join us to build a future that works for everyone because Progress Takes All of Us here .
